# Results

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)

drug <- read.csv('~/Downloads/drug_overdose.csv')
drug_total <- drug[ which(drug$STUB_NAME=='Total'& drug$UNIT == 'Deaths per 100,000 resident population, age-adjusted' & drug$PANEL_NUM != 0), ]
drug_total <- drug_total[c("PANEL_NUM", "ESTIMATE", "YEAR")]

drug_total <- drug_total %>%
  mutate(PANEL= case_when(
    PANEL_NUM==1 ~ "Total",
    PANEL_NUM==2 ~ "Natural or Semisynthetic",
    PANEL_NUM==3 ~ "Methadone",
    PANEL_NUM==4 ~ "Other Synthetic",
    PANEL_NUM==5 ~ "Heroin"
    ))
drug_total$PANEL <- factor(drug_total$PANEL, levels = c("Total", "Natural or Semisynthetic", "Methadone", "Other Synthetic", "Heroin"))

ggplot(drug_total, aes(x=YEAR, y=ESTIMATE, group=PANEL)) +
  geom_line()


```
